channel.title: [Tutorial]A better way to slice your imagers + saves up time for programming it!
channel.description:
Ok, I found this tutor on pixel2life since I found a cs2 download. I went through tutorials and found this: http://onesourcefx.com/forum/export-your-design-to-divs-t-27.html#pid91
I read it and it is really good. So if you are tired of having to slice your images and then save them and program then into css then this tutorial is the right thing for you to read.
